Functions
merge_class
procedure merge_class(
p_fcl_id in fsm_classes_v.fcl_id%type,
p_fcl_name in fsm_classes_v.fcl_name%type,
p_fcl_description in fsm_classes_v.fcl_description%type,
p_fcl_active in boolean default true
)

Creates or modifies a class.

Parameters
p_fcl_id
in fsm_classes_v.fcl_id%type

ID of the class

p_fcl_name
in fsm_classes_v.fcl_name%type

Plain text identifier of the class

p_fcl_description
in fsm_classes_v.fcl_description%type

Description of the class

p_fcl_active
in boolean

Optional flag indicating whether the class should be used (TRUE) or not (FALSE)

delete_class
procedure delete_class(
p_fcl_id in fsm_classes_v.fcl_id%type,
p_force in boolean default false
)

Used to remove a class and optionally all its associated events, states and transitions

Parameters

p_fcl_id  ID of the class p_force - Optional flag indicating whether all referenced objects should also be deleted (TRUE) or not. Default: FALSE

merge_status_group
procedure merge_status_group(
p_fsg_id in fsm_status_groups_v.fsg_id%type,
p_fsg_fcl_id in fsm_status_groups_v.fsg_fcl_id%type,
p_fsg_name in fsm_status_groups_v.fsg_name%type,
p_fsg_description in fsm_status_groups_v.fsg_description%type,
p_fsg_icon_css in fsm_status_groups_v.fsg_icon_css%type default null,
p_fsg_name_css in fsm_status_groups_v.fsg_name_css%type default null,
p_fsg_active in boolean default true
)

Creates or modifies a status group

Parameters
p_fsg_id
in fsm_status_groups_v.fsg_id%type

ID of the status group

p_fsg_fcl_id
in fsm_status_groups_v.fsg_fcl_id%type

Reference to FSM_CLASSES

p_fsg_name
in fsm_status_groups_v.fsg_name%type

Display name of the status group

p_fsg_description
in fsm_status_groups_v.fsg_description%type

Description of the status group. May be used in tooltips

p_fsg_icon_css
in fsm_status_groups_v.fsg_icon_css%type

Optional CSS-class to decorate status group with an icon

p_fsg_name_css
in fsm_status_groups_v.fsg_name_css%type

Optional CSS-class to decorate status group name

p_fst_active

Optional flag to indicate whether this status group is actually used or not. Defaults to TRUE.

delete_status_group
procedure delete_status_group(
p_fsg_id in fsm_status_groups_v.fsg_id%type,
p_fsg_fcl_id in fsm_status_groups_v.fsg_fcl_id%type,
p_force in boolean default false
)

Deletes a status group and optionally all pending states and transitions.

Parameters
p_fsg_id
in fsm_status_groups_v.fsg_id%type

ID of the status group

p_force
in boolean

Optional flag indicating whether all pending statuses and their transitions should also be deleted (TRUE) or not. Default: FALSE

merge_status_severity
procedure merge_status_severity(
p_fss_id in fsm_status_severities_v.fss_id%type,
p_fss_fcl_id in fsm_status_severities_v.fss_fcl_id%type,
p_fss_name in fsm_status_severities_v.fss_name%type,
p_fss_description in fsm_status_severities_v.fss_description%type,
p_fss_html in fsm_status_severities_v.fss_html%type,
p_fss_icon in fsm_status_severities_v.fss_icon%type
)

Creates a status severity representation. Main focus is to map PIT severities to FSM severities such as Milestone or similar.

Parameters
p_fss_id
in fsm_status_severities_v.fss_id%type

Numeric severity as defined in PIT, ranges from 10 .. 70 in increments of 10

p_fss_fcl_id
in fsm_status_severities_v.fss_fcl_id%type

Reference to FSM_CLASSES.

p_fss_name
in fsm_status_severities_v.fss_name%type

Display name of the severity

p_fss_html
in fsm_status_severities_v.fss_html%type

HTML expresssion for display purposes

p_fss_icon
in fsm_status_severities_v.fss_icon%type

HTML CSS classes to display a status icon

delete_status_severity
procedure delete_status_severity(
p_fss_id in fsm_status_severities_v.fss_id%type,
p_fss_fcl_id in fsm_status_severities_v.fss_fcl_id%type
)

Deletes a status severity.

Parameters
p_fss_id
in fsm_status_severities_v.fss_id%type

Numeric severity as defined in PIT, ranges from 10 .. 70 in increments of 10

p_fss_fcl_id
in fsm_status_severities_v.fss_fcl_id%type

Reference to FSM_CLASSES.

merge_status
procedure merge_status(
p_fst_id in fsm_status_v.fst_id%type,
p_fst_fcl_id in fsm_status_v.fst_fcl_id%type,
p_fst_fsg_id in fsm_status_v.fst_fsg_id%type,
p_fst_name in fsm_status_v.fst_name%type,
p_fst_description in fsm_status_v.fst_description%type,
p_fst_msg_id in fsm_status_v.fst_msg_id%type default msg.FSM_STATUS_CHANGED,
p_fst_retries_on_error in fsm_status_v.fst_retries_on_error%type default 0,
p_fst_retry_schedule in fsm_status_v.fst_retry_schedule%type default null,
p_fst_retry_time in fsm_status_v.fst_retry_time%type default null,
p_fst_icon_css in fsm_status_v.fst_icon_css%type default null,
p_fst_name_css in fsm_status_v.fst_name_css%type default null,
p_fst_active in boolean default true
)

Creates or modifies a status.

Parameters
p_fst_id
in fsm_status_v.fst_id%type

ID of the status

p_fst_fcl_id
in fsm_status_v.fst_fcl_id%type

Reference to the class the status belongs to

p_fst_fsg_id
in fsm_status_v.fst_fsg_id%type

Reference to a status group

p_fst_name
in fsm_status_v.fst_name%type

Display name of the status

p_fev_description

Description of the status. May be used in tooltips

p_fst_msg_id
in fsm_status_v.fst_msg_id%type

Optional name of the message used for logging

p_fst_retries_on_error
in fsm_status_v.fst_retries_on_error%type

Optional number of retries allowed to enter this status

p_fst_retry_schedule
in fsm_status_v.fst_retry_schedule%type

Optional schedule if a retry is executed. Controls when this retry takes place

p_fst_retry_time
in fsm_status_v.fst_retry_time%type

Optional duration in seconds the retry is hold back

p_fst_icon_css
in fsm_status_v.fst_icon_css%type

Optional CSS-class to decorate status with an icon

p_fst_name_css
in fsm_status_v.fst_name_css%type

Optional CSS-class to decorate status name

p_fst_active
in boolean

Optional flag to indicate whether this event is used (TRUE) or not (FALSE). Defaults to TRUE.

delete_status

p_fst_fcl_id in fsm_status_v.fst_fcl_id%type,
p_force in boolean default false
)

Parameters

in fsm_status_v.fst_id%type

ID of the status

p_fst_fcl_id
in fsm_status_v.fst_fcl_id%type

Reference to the class the status belongs to

p_force
in boolean

Optional flag indicating whether all pending transitions should also be deleted (TRUE) or not. Default: FALSE

merge_event
procedure merge_event(
p_fev_id in fsm_events_v.fev_id%type,
p_fev_fcl_id in fsm_events_v.fev_fcl_id%type,
p_fev_name in fsm_events_v.fev_name%type,
p_fev_description in fsm_events_v.fev_description%type,
p_fev_msg_id in fsm_events_v.fev_msg_id%type default msg.FSM_EVENT_RAISED,
p_fev_raised_by_user in boolean default false,
p_fev_command_label in fsm_events_v.fev_command_label%type default null,
p_fev_button_icon in fsm_events_v.fev_button_icon%type default null,
p_fev_button_highlight in boolean default false,
p_fev_confirm_message in fsm_events_v.fev_confirm_message%type default null,
p_fev_active in boolean default true
)

Creates or modifies an event.

Parameters
p_fev_id
in fsm_events_v.fev_id%type

ID of the event

p_fev_fcl_id
in fsm_events_v.fev_fcl_id%type

Reference to the class the event belongs to

p_fev_name
in fsm_events_v.fev_name%type

Display name of the event

p_fev_description
in fsm_events_v.fev_description%type

Description of the event. May be used in tooltips

p_fev_msg_id
in fsm_events_v.fev_msg_id%type

Optional name of the message used for logging. Defaults to msg.FSM_EVENT_RAISED

p_fev_raised_by_user
in boolean

Optional flag to indicate whether this event has to be raised by human interaction

p_fev_command

Optional name of a command.

p_fev_button_icon
in fsm_events_v.fev_button_icon%type

Optional icon for a command button

p_fev_button_highlight
in boolean

Optional flag to indicate whether this is a default option

p_fev_confirm_message
in fsm_events_v.fev_confirm_message%type

Optional message that is shown as a confirmation message before executing the command

p_fev_active
in boolean

Optional flag to indicate whether this event is used (TRUE) or not (FALSE). Defaults to TRUE.

delete_event
procedure delete_event(
p_fev_id in fsm_events_v.fev_id%type,
p_fev_fcl_id in fsm_events_v.fev_fcl_id%type,
p_force in boolean default false
)

Deletes an event and optionally all pending transitions

Parameters
p_fcl_id

ID of the event

p_fev_fcl_id
in fsm_events_v.fev_fcl_id%type

Reference to the class the event belongs to

p_force
in boolean

Optional flag indicating whether all pending transits should also be deleted (TRUE) or not. Default: FALSE

merge_transition
procedure merge_transition(
p_ftr_fst_id in fsm_transitions_v.ftr_fst_id%type,
p_ftr_fev_id in fsm_transitions_v.ftr_fev_id%type,
p_ftr_fcl_id in fsm_transitions_v.ftr_fcl_id%type,
p_ftr_fst_list in fsm_transitions_v.ftr_fst_list%type,
p_ftr_raise_automatically in boolean,
p_ftr_raise_on_status in fsm_transitions_v.ftr_raise_on_status%type default fsm.C_OK,
p_ftr_required_role in fsm_transitions_v.ftr_required_role%type default null,
p_ftr_active in boolean default true
)

Creates or modifies a transition

Parameters
p_ftr_fst_id
in fsm_transitions_v.ftr_fst_id%type

Reference to the status

p_ftr_fev_id
in fsm_transitions_v.ftr_fev_id%type

Reference to the event

p_ftr_fcl_id
in fsm_transitions_v.ftr_fcl_id%type

Reference to the class

p_ftr_fst_list
in fsm_transitions_v.ftr_fst_list%type

':'-separated list of status that can be reached when raising the given event

p_ftr_raise_automatically
in boolean

Optional flag to indicate whether this event is to be called automatically (TRUE) or not.  If FALSE, the transition waits for the event to be fired externally.

p_ftr_raise_on_status
in fsm_transitions_v.ftr_raise_on_status%type

Optional flag to indicate whether this transition is fired upon normal execution (C_OK) or in case of an error (C_ERROR). Defaults to fsm.C_OK

p_ftr_required_role
in fsm_transitions_v.ftr_required_role%type

Optional reference to a role that is required to perform this transition

p_ftr_active
in boolean

Optional flag to indicate whether this transition is actually used. Defaults to TRUE

delete_transition
procedure delete_transition(
p_ftr_fst_id in fsm_transitions_v.ftr_fst_id%type,
p_ftr_fev_id in fsm_transitions_v.ftr_fev_id%type,
p_ftr_fcl_id in fsm_transitions_v.ftr_fcl_id%type
)

Parameters
p_ftr_fst_id
in fsm_transitions_v.ftr_fst_id%type

Reference to the status

p_ftr_fev_id
in fsm_transitions_v.ftr_fev_id%type

Reference to the event

p_ftr_fcl_id
in fsm_transitions_v.ftr_fcl_id%type

Reference to the class

create_status_package
procedure create_status_package

Method to create a constant package for all status
